description.raw:
There are [some warnings on Utopic](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-gazebo_5.0-devel-utopic-amd64/38/warnings17Result/) and also [homebrew](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/gazebo/job/gazebo-any-devel-homebrew-amd64/520/warnings7Result/) that we are using deprecated libavcodec functions (part of ffmpeg). This pull request creates helper functions with ifdefs that use the appropriate function for the given version of libavcodec (as recommended on [stackoverflow](http://stackoverflow.com/a/24612042)). The homebrew jenkins build should show these warnings as fixed.

The functions were [deprecated here](https://github.com/FFmpeg/FFmpeg/commit/d7b3ee9).

Previously submitted as pull request #1514, before it was actually working.

The homebrew jenkins build should show these warnings as fixed.

The functions were deprecated here.

Previously submitted as pull request #1514, before it was actually working.

title.raw: Fix ffmpeg deprecation warnings by creating helper functions with ifdefs
